DocAttribute.Name: HasAssignments
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the relationship objects, that assign (by an association relationship) other subtypes of IfcObject to this object instance. Examples are the association to products, processes, controls, resources or groups.

DocAttribute.Name: Nests
IsNestedBy
HasContext
IsDecomposedBy
Decomposes
HasAssociations
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the relationship objects, that associates external references or other resource definitions to the object.. Examples are the association to library, documentation or classification.
